markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift River](/Feats.aspx?ID=486) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
Your turn ends and you have a status penalty to your Speed or are immobilized or slowed.

</column>

---

You flow like water, avoiding all restraints. End one status penalty to your speed, or end one immobilized or slowed condition affecting you.
name: Swift River
